arts.ttl: Werder Bremen stun Wolfsburg with thrilling 4-2 comeback victory
arts.sum: Bremen then took control in the second half with goals from Felix Agu, Marvin Ducksch, and Marco Grüll. The Volkswagen Arena set the stage for a thrilling encounter as VfL Wolfsburg hosted SV Werder Bremen in a Bundesliga clash that promised excitement from the outset.

Bundesliga Matchday 7 concluded with the meeting of VfL Wolfsburg and Werder Bremen. Bremen fell behind early but goals from Weiser, Agu, Ducksch, and Grüll completed the comeback while Patrick Wimmer saw red for Wolfsburg.

arts.ttl: Sunday's Bundesliga predictions including Wolfsburg vs. Werder Bremen
arts.sum: Sports Mole provides score predictions and previews for all of today's Bundesliga fixtures, including Wolfsburg vs. Werder Bremen.

arts.ttl: Wolfsburg vs Werder Bremen preview: Sides look to pull away from drop zone
arts.sum: Mid-table teams Wolfsburg and Werder Bremen are gearing up for a clash at Wolfsburg's Volkswagen Arena this Sunday, both aiming to pull further away from the relegation zone.

arts.ttl: Preview: Wolfsburg vs. Werder Bremen - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Sunday's Bundesliga clash between Wolfsburg and Werder Bremen, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.

arts.ttl: Naby Keita row rumbles on as club chief tells banished ex-Liverpool star he has to leave
arts.sum: Naby Keita left Liverpool in the summer of 2023 after an injury-hit spell under Jurgen Klopp but has endured a nightmare since joining Bundesliga side Werder Bremen on a free transfer
